content.head: BlockBank
content.description:
A platform that revolutionizes how banks can safely store identity information of 
                        their customers, making use of blockchain and machine learning.
                        Built during TechCrunch Hackathon, Hong Kong

content.head: HeraKles
content.description: The University of Hong Kong team for Robomaster Robotics competition 2019

content.head: CodeXpress Myanmar
content.description:
IoT hardware development for urban farmning and sustainability in collaboration with
                        Dagon University, Myanmar.

content.head: Hanoi Waterbots
content.description: Robot for gaining insights on statistics and sources of pollutants in water bodies
content.subhead: Data visualization and web application development (JavaScript)

content.head: Brielle
content.description: Braille tutoring mobile application for visually impaired.
content.subhead: Mobile Application and Backend Development (Flutter + AWS Services)

content.head: Calypso
content.description:
A project collaboration platform for university students so that students can find
                        project collaborators easily and efficiently.

content.head: Other open-source projects
content.description:
Please visit my GitHub to see other projects that I have worked on and made 
                        contributions

content.head: RC Tech
content.description:
RC Tech (founded October 2018) is a student-led community in R.C. Lee Hall that focuses on innovation and
                        development of technology. The club holds events such as workshops and talks on topics like web
                        development, electronics and IoT hardware development, and publishes articles related to similar
                        topics.

content.head: Student/Staff Project Fund
content.description: Student/Staff Project fund by R.C. Lee Hall for RC Tech.
